# framingui - Agentic Design System

> The design system built for AI agents. 0% hallucination by design.

## Overview

framingui provides structured design constraints that LLMs can parse and follow,
generating production-ready UI with consistent colors, typography, and spacing.

## Quick Start

```bash
npx @framingui/mcp-server init
```

## Packages

- @framingui/core: Token generation, OKLCH utilities
- @framingui/ui: 30+ React components
- @framingui/tokens: Raw design tokens
- @framingui/mcp-server: AI tool integration

## Available Themes (7)

1. square-minimalism - Clean geometric design
2. editorial-tech - Airy, typography-first
3. pebble - Soft, rounded minimal
4. neutral-workspace - Warm humanist tones
5. minimal-workspace - Ultra-clean workspace
6. dark-boldness - Bold dark mode
7. classic-magazine - Editorial print style

## MCP Tools

- list-themes: Get all themes
- preview-theme: Get theme tokens
- list-components: Browse components
- generate-blueprint: Natural language â†’ UI
- export-production: Generate production code

## Key Features

- OKLCH color system (perceptually uniform)
- Fluid typography scales
- Consistent spacing tokens
- 30+ accessible components
- MCP protocol support
